title: Talkray - Free Calls & Texts
description: Talkray is the fastest FREE messaging and calling app loved by millions of users. Send messages and pictures or call friends and family across the world for free over Wifi or 3G. Join Talkray and start chatting today! Talkray Features: ★ BEST INTERNATIONAL CALL QUALITY: Clear and optimized for mobile calling across the world.★ LOWEST DATA USAGE: Clear and optimized for mobile calling across the world. ★ GROUP CALLS AND MESSAGING: Supports up to 25 participants for both calls and messaging. ★ NO NEED TO ADD FRIENDS: Works just like regular sms & phone calls by integrating with your existing phonebook. As long as your friends have Talkray installed, you can text and call them all you want for free! ★ SHARE PICTURES, PUSH TO TALK MESSAGES, AND MORE: Share emojis, multimedia, voice notes, location, page friends, and much more. Even doodle and add effects to your photos before sharing.Why Talkray: ★ FREE, NO HIDDEN COST: All features are free. No hidden costs. That means free group calls, free international calls, free texts, and more. Uses WiFi or a mobile data connection.★ SUPPORTS MULTIPLE DEVICES AND LANGUAGES: Talkray supports Android Phones, Tablets, WEAR, as well as iOS. Talkray is available for dozens of languages including Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, English, French, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Portuguese, Spanish, Russian, Telugu, Thai, and more.--------------------------------------------------------------Like us on Facebook - http://facebook.com/talkrayFollow us on Twitter - http://twitter.com/talkrayCircle us on G+ - http://google.com/+TalkrayApp** Emoji provided free by http://emojione.com
descriptionHTML:
Talkray is the fastest FREE messaging and calling app loved by millions of users. Send messages and pictures or call friends and family across the world for free over Wifi or 3G.

Join Talkray and start chatting today!

Talkray Features:
★ BEST INTERNATIONAL CALL QUALITY: Clear and optimized for mobile calling across the world.
★ LOWEST DATA USAGE: Clear and optimized for mobile calling across the world.
★ GROUP CALLS AND MESSAGING: Supports up to 25 participants for both calls and messaging.
★ NO NEED TO ADD FRIENDS: Works just like regular sms & phone calls by integrating with your existing phonebook. As long as your friends have Talkray installed, you can text and call them all you want for free!
★ SHARE PICTURES, PUSH TO TALK MESSAGES, AND MORE: Share emojis, multimedia, voice notes, location, page friends, and much more. Even doodle and add effects to your photos before sharing.

Why Talkray:
★ FREE, NO HIDDEN COST: All features are free. No hidden costs. That means free group calls, free international calls, free texts, and more. Uses WiFi or a mobile data connection.
★ SUPPORTS MULTIPLE DEVICES AND LANGUAGES: Talkray supports Android Phones, Tablets, WEAR, as well as iOS. Talkray is available for dozens of languages including Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, English, French, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Portuguese, Spanish, Russian, Telugu, Thai, and more.
--------------------------------------------------------------
Like us on Facebook - http://facebook.com/talkray
Follow us on Twitter - http://twitter.com/talkray
Circle us on G+ - http://google.com/+TalkrayApp

** Emoji provided free by http://emojione.com
